metadata.name: The Fall
metadata.description: "The Fall" is a 3D digital artwork that investigates the duality of artistry today. It features an astronaut, a symbol of boundless creativity, and a more realistic figure representing the solemn, intellectual side of art. These two characters endlessly collide and separate, capturing the struggle between free artistic expression and the desire for a salient, resonant voice speaking directly to contemporary issues. Utilizing AI, motion capture, hard surface modeling, hand animation, and compositing, I've attempted to illustrate my digital art journey, touching on feelings of isolation, abrupt disruptions, and the whirlwind of emotions that come with new relationships - to people, to technology, and to the self. In essence, "The Fall" is an exploration of life, love, and the constant balancing act between the two sides of a modern digital art practice. This piece is a sincere attempt to encapsulate and share these rich and often conflicting experiences.
